abstract: The NBC station in New York confirmed on Monday that Shiba Russell has been tapped to co-anchor its 11 p.m. newscast.
snippet: The NBC station in New York confirmed on Monday that Shiba Russell has been tapped to co-anchor its 11 p.m. newscast.
lead_paragraph: Shiba Russell, who joined WNBC in early 2011 and faced speculation right away that she was in line to succeed Sue Simmons, will in fact succeed Ms. Simmons on Monday night.

headline.main: Shiba Russell Succeeds Sue Simmons on WNBC
